website_summaries.verdict: Geared up for all-day wear, the Keds Kickstart aims for a stylish canvas footwear look while staying true to its timeless classic sneaker roots. The tennis shoe is extremely lightweight making it a reliable travel companion and for activities that require a lot of walking.While the stiff canvas material seems to bother some users, this upper material is what keeps the feet sturdy. Moreover, the dependable cushioned footbed delivers a comfortable fit and arch support.
pros: A significant number of reviewers find this tennis-inspired canvas sneaker comfortable for everyday wear
Several reviewers say the Keds Kickstart has a simple, versatile design that matches with many types of casual clothes and fashion tastes
The lightweight sneakers are perfect for activities that involve a lot of walking like studying at school, traveling, or running errands
Majority of those who have these low-top shoes like its laidback style and cute cuts that exemplify the simplicity of Keds sneakers
Some customers with arch concerns are pleased with the arch support of these low-top kicks because they feel comfy
The wide range of color variation is among the reasons cited by many customers for buying these low-top sneakers
Majority of sneaker fans like the Keds Kickstart because of its affordable price
The breathable fabric lining helps keep the feet ventilated for hours, a handful of customers have noted
cons: Several users comment that the lack of padding and the stiff canvas material at the back causes blisters and discomfort at the heel area
Some wearers of the Kickstart sneakers from Keds say it takes some time for them to break-in the shoe before it becomes comfortable
A couple of buyers experience the sneaker breaking apart after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Buy your largest size unless you want to wear them barefoot
customer_reviews.text: These are just a little too small. I thought they might stretch out because of the cotton. They do not because of the rubber edge all the way around. I will have to find someone to give these to and I think they will like them. I wear 8-8.5 American and I bought an 8. *edit* I have kept the shoes because I discovered you do not wear socks with them and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: I love Keds!
customer_reviews.text: I love Keds tennis shoes and have multiple pairs and styles. My only complaint would be that the last couple of pairs seem to run just a tiny bit small. They are wearable, but even thin socks seem to be pushing the limit a bit. My older ones fit better. I really love this color and style and my 12 year old granddaughter commented on how cute they were. High compliment from a tween!
customer_reviews.author: C. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great work/daily sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I first received the wrong size, but Amazon re-sent the correct size. Once I had the correct size, they were great. Have been wearing them to work almost everyday for months and they're very comfortable (on my feet all day). Go with everything, lightweight, can be dressed up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne C

customer_reviews.title: Love this style
customer_reviews.text: I love this style tennis shoe. I always put insoles in all my shoes and this one is not an exception but once I did they were just fine and comfortable enough to wear all day. I wanted to buy a white pair, but was unable to because the colors are very limited.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They hurt
customer_reviews.text: I love the plain look of these shoes theyre exactly what I was looking for but they are uncomfortable! They stretch out but not enough. I really wanted to make them work. Really tight and I have a narrow foot. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for comfortable and cute sneakers for an upcoming sightseeing trip, and I'm glad I got these. They are very comfortable, i got a 1/2 size bigger because i was planning on buying gel inserts but i don't think i need them after all, the soles were a lot more cushioned than i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ileana Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are more comfortable than keds of the past. Cute and stylish with jeans, crops or shorts they are a great wardrobe staple!
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pink Sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the pink was a little darker but otherwise I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and style. Nice cushion for the feet, better than I am used to. Size is perfect. I didn't need to break them in, no blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Neptunesister

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, great arch supports- bought 2 pair!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes- fit was true to size and very comfortable, bought 2 pair in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the color and comfort of these shoes that go with just about anything!
customer_reviews.author: Helene Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were stylish to take on vacation but also comfortable for all the walking I did during my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the light weight comfort if these sneakers. very versatile and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Erica McKay

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Kickstart Sneaker
product_meta.description: The Tennis-inspired Keds Kickstart Mini Chambray Will Look Great Paired With Your Favorite Pair Of Jeans! Made With A Chambray Upper That Is Perfect For Warm Spring Days. This Shoe Features A Cushioned Ortholite Footbed For Comfort And A Sturdy, Rubber Outsole.
feature_bullets: Lace to toe sneaker with 6 eyelets
Care instructions: spot wash, air dry only
